THSTD(1) General Commands Manual THSTD(1)

NAME

thstd — Touhou background script tool

SYNOPSIS

thstd [-V] [-d | -c -VERSION] [input [output]]

DESCRIPTION

The thstd utility performs various actions on background scripts. The following commands are available:

thstd -c version [input output]
Compiles a stage script.
thstd -d version [input [output]]
Dumps a stage script.
thstd -V
Displays the program version.

EXIT STATUS

The thstd utility exits with 0 on success, 1 on error.

SEE ALSO

Project homepage

SECURITY CONSIDERATIONS

Invalid data may not be properly handled. Do not operate on untrusted files.

September 24, 2018 thtk-12
